title: [BUG] Red tracker duplicates posts
body:
I'm browsing on mobile: Samsung Galaxy S4, android 4.4.2, firefox 34.0.1.

Here's an example of one that's right above itself for easy screenshotting, but they're not always that way. If I had to go with gut instinct here, as a CS student, I'd guess it's related to 'show more'.

edit: I wonder if it could also be related to rioters editing their own posts.

replies.body:
Interesting... I'm seeing this on the desktop browser as well. I'm fairly certain it wasn't like that a week ago.  I'll let the dev team know. Thanks!

Edit: Actually.... nevermind. Those specific Rioters just happened to be posting in the same thread in a very short span of time. I'll try to confirm this.
Yeah. One way to know is going to the posts themselves and see if the red posts matches the amount on the red tracker.
